3: I knew it wouldn't be that easy.
I better hurry up and finish President Hassen's mission.
Hurtling through an emergency pipeline, Murray opens the hatch above him and enters the core area known as the tactical bridge.
Bridge console, combat info center, then the database, huh...
The sprawling and chaotic data avatar silently waits. Its tendrils incessantly reach for the terminal monitor.
(The latest update from the Kowloong war suggested that the Ascendants had snatched the key of Huaxu... Which means that the Ascendants are likely the culprits this time.)
(But I can't handle Huaxu one-on-one, and Cerberus... isn't here as well.)
I'll have to avoid that thing's data radar and rush for the database.
(If Lee is here... he would be able to easily slip past that kind of data radar.)
